name: galvanize

effect.scarlet-violet: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.
effect.the-teal-mask: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.
effect.the-indigo-disk: When this Pokémon uses a Normal moves, that move is Electric its power is 1.2×.

short_effect: This Pokémon's Normal moves are Electric and have their power increased to 1.2×.

flavor_text.the-teal-mask: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves. The power of those moves is boosted a little.
